info.author: Alan Post
info.description:
mockturtle is the command-line interface to the Turtle Services private
network, https://turtle.services/.  Mock Turtle provides simple, critical
infrastructure--website publishing, user management, electronic mail,
chat, and file sharing.  turtle.services hosts dns, ssl, git, ftps, https,
imap, irc, ldap, sftp, and smtp services.
